text: Jiaru liang pai xinshi xiang dou, nimen dang zai tamen zhi jian tiaojie [zhu]. Jiaru qizhong yipai qiya ling yipai, nimen dang gongji qiya di na pai, zhidao tamen zhixing an la de mingling. Jiaru tamen zhixing, name, nimen dang zai tamen zhi jian binggong tiaojie, dang zhuchi gongdao. An la dique xihuan zhuchi gongdao zhe.
